description: A Song of Ice and Fire: The Miniatures Game Season 4 has been out for a while now, and people have flooded to the game to try out the new changes. After letting things settle and the initial reactions digest, we will continue our review of S.04 and how much it has and will impact […]
title: Free Folk and Night’s Watch – S04 Review – ASOIAF: TMG

description: Who is Bishop? Bishop (Lucas Bishop) is a time-traveling mutant from one of the many dystopian futures seen over the years in X-Men comics. He first appeared in Uncanny X-Men #238, with his first major storyline being the X-Cutioner’s Song storyline. Before traveling to the past, he was the commander of a mutant police force, […]
title: Marvel Crisis Protocol – Bishop and Nightcrawler Review

description: Introduction It’s new Sectorial time! In an annual tradition, Corvus Belli are coming in to Adepticon hot, with a new Sectorial army. In this case it really is brand new; no refreshes or resculpts here. O-12 (essentially the Space United Nations of the future, in Infinity lore) is the most recent tabletop faction to be […]
title: Infinity Faction Reveal: Torchlight Brigade

description: Welcome back to the weekly metagame update and UTC recap! We’ve got some fast fallers, and some melee dominance as per usual. With our beloved Space Marines remaining down in the 45% win rate, it seems that it remains difficult to succeed with only six activations. Perhaps the incoming Night Lords can break this streak? […]
title: Killteam UTC Weekend Recap and Preview: Mar 05-Mar 11, 2024

description: One of the first things that any player wants to do when they start a new system or period is learn how to make a warband, army, battlegroup, etcetera. Gamers want to know how to plan their purchases and what they might absolutely need right now and what they can save for later. They also […]
title: Goonhammer Historicals: Creating a Silver Bayonet Unit From the Main Rulebook

description: Ton is joined by Chris, Ed and Scrivo to talk the challenge of Starting, maintaining and most importantly: finishing a new project! All our handy social links: https://linktr.ee/6plusplusgaming
title: That 6+++ Show Episode 79: Sticking the Landing: New Projects in 40k

title: Goonhammer Reviews The Fallout: Science! Commander Deck

description: BAMF-ing onto the Marvel Crisis Protocol scene courtesy of the folks over at Atomic Mass Games is fan-favorite X-Man Nightcrawler. But who is this character? description: Ace takes a look at the Kill Team meta since the Q4 balance dataslate - who's doing well, who's struggling, and what to expect moving forward.
title: The Q1 2024 Kill Team Meta

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? returns with another Kill Team video covering his exploits at two different tournaments! He goes over his first event, a four round tournament in High Wycombe, with Kommandos and then his next one with Starstriders at Warhammer World!
title: CYRAC: Kill Team Tournament Reports
